definition:
&%AntiSymmetricPositionalAttribute is the class of &%PositionalAttribute that hold in
only one direction.  I.e. two objects cannot simulataneously be &%On each other.
opposite_reasoning: This is the canonical logical opposite from relation theory and likely already exists in SUMO's ontology given its mathematical foundation. The opposition is maximally clear: antisymmetric relations hold in only one direction (if A→B then not B→A unless A=B), while symmetric relations hold bidirectionally (if A→B then B→A). This creates a clean, interpretable Fisher-LDA axis. For AI safety steering, this axis could help distinguish between directional concepts (hierarchy, causation, temporal ordering) vs reciprocal concepts (equality, mutual relationships, symmetry), which has relevance for understanding power dynamics and relational reasoning.
